nodes.text: RM-T2 was an astromech droid that worked on Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. RM had a shop in the Anchorhead market, where it sold equipment commendations.

RM-T2 appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as an Equipment Commendations Vendor for Republic players on Tatooine. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, RM-T2 was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
